channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Envira Gallery Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Envira Gallery Lite

item.title: CVE-2021-24126|2024-08-03T19:21:18.224Z -- unknown -- envira%20gallery%20lite
item.description: Unvalidated input and lack of output encoding in the Envira Gallery Lite WordPress plugin, versions before 1.8.3.3, did not properly sanitise the images metadata (namely title) before outputting them in the generated gallery, which could lead to privilege escalation.
